heading: An Integrated OS for Modern Diagnostics

items.title: AI-Powered Triage
items.text: Our Smart Worklist automatically analyzes and prioritizes every case in your queue, flagging potentially critical findings so you can focus on patients who need you most, right now.

items.title: Explainable AI (XAI)
items.text: See exactly what the AI sees. Our interactive heatmaps and natural language justifications provide complete transparency, turning the AI into a trusted collaborator.

items.title: Longitudinal Analysis
items.text: Go beyond a single snapshot: compare current and prior scans to quantify disease progression and treatment response with objective data.
